item.description:
There will be a community field trip to Chuang Yen Monastery in Carmel, New York. This trip is free of charge and relies on carpooling and sharing the expenses for fuel.  We will leave at 10 a.m. from two locations: Middletown and Wethersfield, and retuen at 5 p.m. Field trip includes guided tour of monastery, a little sitting and walking meditation, complimentary buddhist books and a vegetarian lunch (additional $5). This is a great way to learn more about the Buddhist teachings, practices, culture and Tang dynasty architecture.

 

RSVP and contact us if you are coming long.
item.how_to_find_us: We will daprt from two locations: Middletown and Wethersfield. Please email us for specific locations.
item.why: ...to learn more about buddhist teachings, practices, culture and architecture. It is also a good way to meet other people with similar values.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Field Trip - Chuang Yen Monastery, New York
